sqoop.arg: SELECT _SP_PalletLabelID,PalletID,MachineStage,PartNumber,InvState,PalletNo,CreatedDT,CompleteDT,Quantity,LabelTemplate,PrinterURL,PrintedDT,ScannedDT,IsCancelled,IsReprint,PartDescription,LabelSaveDirectory,IsPrintLandscape,NoCopies,LabelsPerInventoryPack, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_PalletLabel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionDeviceID,AcquisitionVariableTypeID,WorkstationConfigID,Instructions,ImageURI,RfSourceID,DataDeviceID,DeviceArgs,DeviceOutput,FillMode,Preset,Multiplier,PreprocessingFunction,IsManualTrigger,IsManualConfirm, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionDevice WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionNoteID,ActionID,Note,Comments,NoteDT,LoginID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionNote WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AssetID,AssetName,RfAssetTypeID,LineID,MachineStageID,ToolID,GaugeID,PartID,InventoryPackID,LocationID,IsRetired,CostCentreID,ManufacturerID,SupplierID,AcquiredDT,PONumber,OrderedDT,ExpectedDeliveryDT,ExpectedFirstUseDT,EndUseDT,EndUseReason,PurchaseCost,DefaultLocationID,Comments, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Asset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AttributeTypeID,ProductTypeID,Name,Description,ImageURI,RfAttributeClassID,IsPassFail,IsRaiseCA,LikelyCauses,Impact,Weighting,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,AttributeTypeCode, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AttributeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT BOMVariantID,BOMVariant,PartID,IsDefault,BOMVariantIndex,IsRetired,LoginID,DT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMVariant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ConcernStatusID,ConcernStatus,ConditionalFormat,IsClosedState, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ConcernStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DefectCountPID,MeasurementSetPID,HeadNo,DefectCount,Ignored,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.DefectCountP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT FaultStateID,FaultID,FromDT,ToDT,FaultStatusID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OriginalLoginID,EditedFaultStateID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.FaultState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT InventoryUsageID,StartUsingComments,StopUsingComments,StartLoginID,StopLoginID,OpenedStartDT,OpenedEndDT,SavedStartDT,SavedEndDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedInventoryUsageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InventoryUsage_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineSectionID,LineSection,Description,IsRetired, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineSection WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LKConcernActionID,ConcernID,ActionID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentAssetID,DocumentID,AssetID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentAsset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkInvPackInvPackID,InventoryPackFromID,InventoryPackToID,RfInventoryLinkTypeID,LoginID,ModifiedDT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkInvPackInvPack WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageID,MachineGroupID,LkMGMSID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMGMS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkPartDocumentID,PartID,DocumentID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartDocument WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT RfSPCStatID,SPCStatsStyleID,LkSPCStatsStyleRfSPCStatID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKSPCStatsStyleRfSPCStat_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VarChartOCID,RfViolationRuleID,LkVCOCVRuleID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkVCOCVRule WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageEventID,LoginID,DT,MachineStageID,MachineStageEventTypeID,Comments, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageEvent WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStopReasonGroupID,MachineStopReasonGroup,Description,MachineStopReasonGroupCode, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStopReasonGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceProcedureGroupID,MaintenanceProcedureGroup,Description, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceWorkID,WorkDone,Comments,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceWork_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SerialNo,TimePacked,IMS_No, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ModulePackedDateTime_Buffer WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCItemID,OPCServerID,OPCGroupID,TagName,TagAddress,RfOPCItemTypeID,IsNotify,RawValue,UpdatedDT,Quality,Value,LastRawValue,LastUpdatedDT,LastQuality,LastValue,MachineStageID,ChangeAction,PLCID,IsDatedOnServer,IsStoredAsArray,IsActive,MachineStageEventTypeID,RfTransitionTypeID,TransitionToValue, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCItem WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCSpeedID,OPCItemID,Description,Scale,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCSpeed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT PartTypeID,PartType,Description,PartTypeCode,Variant1TagListID,Variant2TagListID,Variant3TagListID,Variant4TagListID,Variant5TagListID,Variant6TagListID,Variant7TagListID,Variant8TagListID,Variant9TagListID,Variant10TagListID,Variant11TagListID,Variant12TagListID,Variant13TagListID,Variant14TagListID,Variant15TagListID,Variant16TagListID,Variant17TagListID,Variant18TagListID,Variant19TagListID,Variant20TagListID,RfInventoryAccountingModeID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT RootCauseID,RootCause,Comments,RootCauseTypeID,LineTypeID,MachineStageTypeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.RootCause WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantDefaultsID,StartOfDay,StartOfWeek,StartOfYear,RfLocaleID,RfDefaultCurrencyID,DataEntryDefaultURI,OnDataCommitGoTo,ChainToStopped,ColourStagesForCurrentJob,UnAckAlarmsPeriod,ShowOverdueIcon,ShowAlarmIcon,WONumberModeID,IsShowVarClassCombo,IsShowAcqClassCombo,RfMachineStopRecordModeID,IsAutoCreateProductsForParts,IsAutoCreateProductTypeForPart,EnforceClosedAlarms,ColourOrder,IsAutoReleaseJob,JobClose,IsAllowDuplicateWONumbers,WoClose,IsOverdueRefToJob,DefaultSPCCalcStyleID,IsAllowInventoryInserts, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantDefaults WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftSequenceID,ShiftPatternID,ShiftTypeID,Sequence,ShiftStartTime,ShiftEndTime, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftSequence WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetID,SPCChartSet,AcquisitionID,SPCURI,RfDataBandID,NPeriods,SpecTypeID,IsRunningProductOnly,LHSessionID,MaxTrendRecallWindow, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSet WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCStatsStyleID,SPCStatsStyle,IsSystem, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCStatsStyle_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagListValueID,TagListID,TagListValue,DisplayOrder,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagListValue WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTypeID,RfDataTypeID,Name,TagTypeCode,ISSYSTEM,TAGVIEW, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolID,Supplier,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,Ident, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Tool_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolGroupID,ToolGroup,Description,ToolGroupCode, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT FromUnitID,ToUnitID,Multiplier,UnitConversionID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitConversion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeClassID,VariableTypeClass,Description,Priority, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VariableTypeClass WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WorkInstructionProcedureID,WorkInstructionProcedure,WorkInstructionRef,PartID,IsEdited,FromDT,ToDT,RevisionNo,LoginID,ModifiedDT, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionProcedure WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStage.MachineStageID, MachineStage.MachineStageTypeID, MachineStage.Name, MachineStage.IsRetired, MachineStage.DepartmentID, MachineStage.Description, MachineStage.CurrentShiftPatternID, MachineStage.NoHeads, MachineStage.IsOEEBottleNeck, MachineStage.IsProductionOutput, MachineStage.MachineStopID, MachineStage.StoppedScreenThreshold, MachineStage.LineSectionID, MachineStage.IsDiscrete, MachineStage.RfDowntimeCollectionModeID, MachineStage.RfSpoilageCollectionModeID, MachineStage.RfProductionCollectionModeID, MachineStage.LastBuildRecordID, MachineStage.CurrentJobID, MachineStage_Custom.ModuleDatabase, MachineStage_Custom.IntendedWOID, MachineStage_Custom.MachineStageCode, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM MachineStage FULL JOIN MachineStage_Custom ON (MachineStage.MachineStageID = MachineStage_Custom.MachineStageID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
